author: archyde
title: ANMIL Celebrates Reactivation of Occupational Disease Clinic in Civitanova Marche
text:
A Triumph for the People of Macerata! By Your Favorite Comedy Analysts: A Snarky Look at Occupational Health
Ah, Rome. The Eternal City! Where the past is as rich as the pizza, and the present seems a bit… well, let’s say “enthusiastically reactivated.” It’s 7 November 2024, and what do we have? The ANMIL Territorial Council of Macerata has just announced something quite remarkable—a triumphant reactivation of the clinic at the INAIL headquarters in Civitanova Marche! Yes, folks, healthcare is back on the menu!
Now, if you’re wondering what INAIL is, let me clarify: it’s not the Italian version of “In-N-Out Burger,” though one could argue that a burger might be more appetizing than some bureaucratic acronyms. INAIL stands for “Istituto Nazionale Assicurazione Infortuni sul Lavoro,” or the National Institute for Insurance against Accidents at Work. Try saying that three times fast after a few cocktails!
Anyway, our pal Sergio Fattorillo , the President of the ANMIL Territorial Council, was practically doing cartwheels when the news hit. “We rejoice!” he declared. I mean, who wouldn’t? Imagine being told that something you haven’t been able to do since 2020 (like using the clinic) is back! When a service is as essential to its members as a morning coffee is to the rest of us, you can bet there will be a celebration. Hip-hip-hooray and all that jazz!
What else did he have to say? Oh yes, a hearty congratulations to Dr. Piero Iacono, the INAIL Director of the Marche, and the local representatives for their valiant efforts in restoring this much-needed service. After all, transporting oneself for treatment in the midst of an ongoing pandemic? That’s a gamble. Might as well roll those dice at the local casino instead! But let’s not digress into our love for leisure and bad decisions, shall we?
Now let’s get to the juicy bit—the clinic itself. Man, it sounds inviting! Spearheaded by the ever-dedicated Dr. Simona Ancora and nurse Maria Cristina Pennacchietti, this little bastion of hope will be open every Tuesday, 8.30 AM to 12.30 PM, but only by appointment. Because what’s life without a little suspense? No walk-ins here, my friends! It’s like trying to sneak into a Lee Evans show—it just won’t work!
But let’s get serious for a moment, shall we? This reactivation isn’t just a logistical win; it’s a lifeline for the more than 2,400 individuals in the Province of Macerata affected by occupational diseases. Imagine spending your day dodging forklifts only to find out you’ve got to travel miles to get treatment! Just like our comedy heroes—exceptionally clever and delivering their punchlines from all corners of the UK—the people of Macerata will now be able to receive care right on their doorstep!
In conclusion, let’s raise a glass to the reopening of the clinic—a much-needed service that should have remained untouched like Rowan Atkinson’s iconic Mr. Bean: awfully hilarious, yet thoroughly appreciated. If you need further information, don’t hesitate! Just contact the ANMIL headquarters, and they’ll guide you like an overzealous tour guide in a museum of oddities—because everyone deserves a little help navigating the funhouse of life.
Contact Details:
Email: macerata@anmil.it Phone: 073330414 – 3346691653 So there you have it, folks. Health care is like comedy; timing is everything! Onward, Macerata! Let’s make some noise!
This HTML presentation captures the lively and entertaining tone you’re aiming for, while also delivering the key information from the article. It’s crafted to engage readers and provide an enjoyable read with the unique blend of humor inspired by the comics mentioned!
PRESS RELEASE
Rome, 7 November 2024 – The ANMIL Territorial Council of Macerata is thrilled to announce the eagerly awaited reactivation of the clinic located at the INAIL headquarters in Civitanova Marche, dedicated to the treatment of occupational diseases. This service is particularly vital for the over 2,400 members we represent in the Province of Macerata, with two dedicated information points in the Civitanova region, comments the ANMIL territorial President Sergio Fattorillo as he expresses his satisfaction upon hearing the news about the clinic’s revival following the disruptions caused by the pandemic. The President went on to extend heartfelt congratulations to the INAIL Director of the Marche, Dr. Piero Iacono, along with the local representatives of the Institute, for their commitment to restoring a crucial service that had been suspended since 2020. This reinstatement is especially significant given the high demand in the region, as many residents requiring these essential medical treatments had previously faced challenges in accessing services, often traveling great distances to obtain care. The clinic , staffed by the diligent medical examiner director Dr. Simona Ancora and nurse Maria Cristina Pennacchietti, will operate every Tuesday from 8:30 AM to 12:30 PM, exclusively by appointment.
For further information, you can reach out to the ANMIL headquarters in Macerata by emailing macerata@anmil.it or calling the following numbers: 073330414 – 3346691653
**Interview with Sergio Fattorillo, President of the ANMIL Territorial Council, Macerata**
**Editor:** Welcome, Sergio! We are thrilled to have you here to discuss ⁣the exciting reactivation of⁣ the INAIL clinic in Civitanova Marche. It sounds like a huge milestone​ for the community!
**Sergio Fattorillo:** Thank you! I’m excited to ​be here as well. This is indeed a joyous moment for us, and after such a⁤ long wait since 2020, we truly rejoice in this⁣ reopening!
**Editor:**​ That’s fantastic! Can you ⁤elaborate on⁤ why this clinic is so important for the​ people of Macerata?
**Sergio⁢ Fattorillo:** Absolutely. The clinic not only provides essential services for occupational health but also supports​ over 2,400 individuals affected by work-related diseases in our province. Imagine needing treatment and having ‌to travel miles during a ⁤pandemic—this clinic brings that care right to our doorstep, which is ‍vital for our‍ community.
**Editor:** It sounds​ like a real ⁤lifeline! I love the humor in ‍your announcement, comparing⁢ healthcare to coffee. How did you feel when you‌ received ⁤the news of the clinic’s reopening?
**Sergio Fattorillo:** (laughs) It was like a shot of espresso! I was ecstatic.⁢ There’s​ something about being able ⁢to reinstate such ​an important ⁤service that fills⁣ you with energy and joy. We were all doing ⁣mental cartwheels!
**Editor:** That’s‌ wonderful! Now, let’s talk logistics. How can people access these‌ services?
**Sergio⁣ Fattorillo:** The clinic will be ‍open every Tuesday from 8:30 AM to 12:30 PM, but only by ⁢appointment. We want to keep the experience organized and smooth, so no walk-ins ‌allowed. It adds⁤ a little thrill ⁢to the process, don’t you think?
**Editor:** ​It certainly does! With appointments being essential, how can folks get⁣ in touch to ⁣schedule their visits?
**Sergio Fattorillo:** They can⁢ reach out to us ⁤directly via email at⁢ macerata@anmil.it or give us a call at 073330414 ⁢or 3346691653.⁢ We’re here to help guide them through⁣ the process!
**Editor:** Amazing!​ Before we wrap ⁤up, what⁤ message do ‌you ⁢want to share with the ⁢people of Macerata?
**Sergio Fattorillo:** Just ​a huge thank you for your patience and support during these challenging times. We’re back, and we’re here to ensure​ everyone gets the⁣ care they need. Let’s embrace this moment together!
**Editor:** Thank you so​ much, Sergio! It’s great to hear ​your ‌passion, ‌and we look forward ​to ⁢seeing the positive impacts of ⁣this‍ reactivated‍ clinic!
**Sergio Fattorillo:** Thank you!‌ Onward, Macerata! Let’s celebrate‌ health care returning to⁤ our community!

author: 小浪财讯
title: 华东重机跌2.88%，成交额6.48亿元，近5日主力净流入-2.47亿|华东重机_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
8月14日， 华东重机 跌2.88%，成交额6.48亿元，换手率8.08%，总市值78.20亿元。
异动分析
芯片概念+新型工业化+专精特新+航运概念+高端装备
1、2024年7月29日公告，公司拟以不超过人民币3亿元的投前估值收购厦门锐信图芯科技有限公司（以下简称“锐信图芯”“标的公司”） 股权并增资，即以不超过11,250万元向许清河、南京锐锋聚信企业管理合伙企业（有限合伙） （以下简称“锐锋聚信”） 收购其持有的锐信图芯合计37.50%股权（对应注册资本126.2626万元） ，并以不超过3,000万元认购锐信图芯新增的注册资本33.67万元（以下简称“本次交易”） 。 本次交易完成后，公司持有锐信图芯43.18%股权，公司为锐信图芯的单一最大股东，同时有权决定其董事会半数以上成员的选任，锐信图芯将纳入公司合并报表范围。标的公司主营业务为GPU芯片及解决方案。
2、2022年7月27日互动易：公司目前主营业务聚焦于以“集装箱装卸设备”和“智能数控机床”为主的高端装备制造板块，并加强相应的研发人才队伍建设。
3、专精特新“小巨人”企业是全国中小企业评定工作中最高等级、最具权威的荣誉称号，是指专注于细分市场、创新能力强、市场占有率高、掌握关键核心技术、质量效益优的排头兵企业，对于提升中小企业自身的竞争力，以及提升产业链、供应链稳定性和竞争力具有重大意义。公司已入选工信部国家级专精特新小巨人企业名单。
4、公司为我国具备轨道吊和岸桥资质和生产能力的专业化集装箱装卸设备生产厂商，与长江水系、珠江水系、京杭运河水系以及沿海的主要港口都建立了长期的合作伙伴关系，产品覆盖国内主要内河港口和部分沿海港口，其中公司生产的轨道吊产品还应用于部分铁路货场。 公司轨道吊在我国内河港口市场占有优势地位；公司生产出国内60米大跨度的轨道吊，填补我国大跨度轨道吊的空白。与此同时，公司岸桥已逐渐成为我国重要的岸桥生产厂商之一
5、2018年5月2日晚间公告，全资子公司润星科技与重庆市忠县人民政府签署了投资意向书，双方计划由润星科技在忠县乌杨新区投资建设“高端装备制造产业园项目”，项目计划总投资10亿元。本次投资将使润星科技在原有高速钻攻加工中心等产品的基础上，向着为满足机械制造、汽摩、军工、新兴电子等行业需求的中大型数控机床产品制造方向迈进。公司为江苏省高新技术企业，设有江苏省企业院士工作站和江苏省新型集装箱专用装卸设备工程技术研究中心，拥有国内最早一批从事轨道式集装箱门式起重机研发和生产的技术团队。公司创新开发出一至四代轨道式集装箱门式起重机并在该产品上应用了人机介面、CMS 管理、PLC控制、变频调速、故障诊断等技术。以及掌握了控制解决大跨度起重机啃轨和南北方温差大的制造、安装等一系列核心技术及工艺。
(免责声明：分析内容来源于互联网，不构成投资建议，请投资者根据不同行情独立判断)
资金分析
今日主力净流入-2777.20万，占比0.04%，行业排名24/35，连续3日被主力资金减仓；所属行业主力净流入-7.67亿，连续3日被主力资金减仓。
区间 今日 近3日 近5日 近10日 近20日 主力净流入 -2777.20万 -1.02亿 -2.47亿 -1.90亿 -1.94亿
主力持仓
主力轻度控盘，筹码分布较为分散，主力成交额2.51亿，占总成交额的12.28%。
技术面：筹码平均交易成本为7.81元
该股筹码平均交易成本为7.81元，近期该股有吸筹现象，但吸筹力度不强；目前股价在压力位8.16和支撑位7.30之间，可以做区间波段。
公司简介
资料显示，无锡华东重型机械股份有限公司位于江苏省无锡市滨湖区高浪东路508号华发传感大厦B座24楼，成立日期2004年1月9日，上市日期2012年6月12日，公司主营业务涉及聚焦于以“集装箱装卸设备”和“智能数控机床”为主的高端装备制造板块,同时,公司借助光伏行业发展机遇,拓展 太阳能 电池组件业务,推进业务结构转型升级。主营业务收入构成为：数控机床46.08%，集装箱装卸设备25.02%，电池片及其他24.96%，数控设备材料1.88%，GPU芯片1.56%，软件开发0.50%。
华东重机所属申万行业为：机械设备-工程机械-工程机械整机。所属概念板块包括：GPU、小盘、专精特新、 机器人 概念、新型工业化等。
截至3月31日，华东重机股东户数9.69万，较上期减少19.27%；人均流通股10394股，较上期增加23.87%。2025年1月-3月，华东重机实现营业收入2.15亿元，同比增长41.12%；归母净利润3436.77万元，同比增长64.64%。
分红方面，华东重机A股上市后累计派现1.85亿元。近三年，累计派现0.00元。
风险提示：市场有风险，投资需谨慎。本文为AI大模型自动发布，任何在本文出现的信息（包括但不限于个股、评论、预测、图表、指标、理论、任何形式的表述等）均只作为参考，不构成个人投资建议。

author: Noah Camras
title: Dodgers' Max Muncy Exits Wednesday's Game With Scary Knee Injury
text:
Los Angeles Dodgers All-Star third baseman Max Muncy has exited Wednesday’s game early with a scary knee injury.
Muncy tagged out Michael Taylor on a stolen base attempt, but Taylor slid into Muncy’s knee in a scary scene at Dodger Stadium.
Muncy went down to the ground in immediate pain, and was agonizing in pain for a while before being helped off the field.
Here’s a video of the injury:
Wishing Max Muncy the very best ? pic.twitter.com/WxxgUIzWrD
— Dillard Barnhart (@BarnHasSpoken2) July 3, 2025 Muncy has completely turned around his season after a slow start, and has been arguably the team’s best hitter as of late. The last thing the team wants to see is Muncy on the shelf for significant time, so they’ll hope the injury isn’t as bad as it seems.
Shortly after Muncy exited the game, Clayton Kershaw recorded the 3,000th strikeout of his career , becoming the 20th player in MLB history to accomplish the feat.
Read more: Dodgers’ Clayton Kershaw Becomes 20th Pitcher in MLB History With 3,000 Strikeouts
Photo Credit: Gary A. Vasquez-Imagn Images

author: @dailytimespak
title: World Population Day: PM stresses importance of joint efforts for resilient future
text: Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Thursday called on government departments, civil society, the private sector, and international partners to collaborate for a resilient and equitable future. In his message on World Population Day being observed on Thursday, (July 11, 2024), he stressed the importance of sustainable population growth to ensure every citizen enjoys dignity, security, and prosperity. “Our government is fully committed in its endeavors of providing quality education and skills training to this young generation to compete in a rapidly evolving global economy. Additionally, we are creating sufficient job opportunities for the youth to harness their potential and turn this youth bulge into an asset.” “I urge all stakeholders – government departments, civil society, private sector, and our international partners – to join hands in our pursuit of a resilient and equitable future. Together, we can build a Pakistan where every citizen enjoys a life of dignity, security, and prosperity by steadfastly pursuing the path of achieving sustainable population growth.” Creating an environment where every Pakistani can thrive requires effective management of our population growth, ensuring a balance between resources and population size to foster economic growth, improve living standards, and reduce poverty, he emphasized. Pakistan’s demographic makeup reveals a significant youth majority, comprising over 65% of the population under 30 years old. This dynamic presents dual prospects and difficulties. The nation’s youth represent a powerful force for fostering economic growth, innovation, and societal advancement. However, it also brings challenges in areas such as education, employment, and social cohesion. Inclusive data allows us to pinpoint areas needing attention, from healthcare and education to economic opportunities and social protection. “The government recognizes the varied needs and challenges of our population. Equity is fundamental to our development agenda, and by achieving a sustainable population growth rate, we aim to tackle disparities and strive towards a society where all individuals have equitable access to resources and opportunities essential for their success,” stated the Prime Minister.

author: adamtaylornba
title: Jrue Holiday is in the best situation to win
text:
The Boston Celtics traded for Jrue Holiday just before the new NBA season began. The veteran guard had originally been moved to the Portland Trail Blazers as part of the deal that sent Damian Lillard to the Milwaukee Bucks . Since joining the Celtics, Holiday has proven himself to be a valuable addition to the rotation, striking up a strong partnership with Derrick White .
In a recent interview with Melissa Rohlin of Fox Sports, Holiday discussed his new surroundings, why he believes the Celtics are the “best situation” for his goals, and how he sees the current point of his career.
“I think probably since I got traded that this has been my best situation to win,” Holiday said. “For where I am in my career and what I want to do, and the goals I want to reach, I feel like this team is on the same path. So, this is definitely, in my opinion, the best situation.”
Holiday has been an ever-present for the Celtics to begin the season. He’s played in 27 games, averaging 13.1 points, 6.7 rebounds, and 4.9 assists, shooting 46.6% from the field and 41.9% from 3-point range.
Celtics Lab 233: Boston beats the Lakers on Christmas Day, and making sense of trade rumors with Bobby Krivitsky https://t.co/GzzNf981pe via @thecelticswire pic.twitter.com/H9HizoNJAM
— The Celtics Wire (@TheCelticsWire) December 26, 2023
Boston currently holds one of the best records in the NBA and is returning from a four-game road trip where they went 3-1, including a Christmas Day victory over the Los Angeles Lakers.
The Holiday addition has elevated the Celtics’ overall skill level and has ensured they have enough talent and versatility to be seen as genuine championship contenders this season.

author: Juan Rodríguez de Rivera
title: Este es el pan de toda la vida en España que está destrozando tu páncreas sin que te des cuenta
text:
El azúcar es uno de los ingredientes que más perjudican a la salud y, por desgracia, está en multitud de productos del supermercado. En los últimos años nos hemos hecho expertos a la hora de detectarlo en nuestra cesta de la compra, pero no sólo vale con esto . Algunos de los alimentos que con más frecuencia aumentan nuestra glucosa en sangre no llevan un listado de ingredientes al reverso donde buscar el azúcar. El más famoso es el pan blanco.
La ley española dice que el pan, "sin otro calificativo, es el producto resultante de la cocción de una masa obtenida por la mezcla de harina y agua, con o sin adición de sal, fermentada con la ayuda de levadura de panificación o masa madre". Con estos ingredientes, ¿cómo es posible que el pan blanco sea capaz de elevar nuestra glucosa en sangre y, al final, poner en riesgo a nuestro páncreas? La explicación se encuentra en sus carbohidratos.
El pan blanco, que es el favorito de los españoles, se elabora con harina de trigo refinada, lo que significa que se le retira al grano de cereal la capa de salvado que lo recubre. ¿Y qué queda? El germen y el endospermo, que cuando se muelen dejan una harina compuesta por almidones. Estos almidones son carbohidratos simples, es decir, que se descomponen en azúcares rápidamente y es de esta manera como terminan subiendo la glucosa.
Golpe al cáncer de páncreas: científicos españoles identifican una de las claves de su alta agresividad Es decir, aunque en los ingredientes del pan no está el azúcar, este ingrediente aparece durante su digestión y, por tanto, produce efectos similares en el organismo. El pan blanco es lo que se conoce como un alimento de alto índice glucémico. Esta variable indica lo rápido que un alimento es capaz de generar un pico de glucosa en la sangre cuando se consume. Los carbohidratos refinados, por tanto, tienen un índice alto que se acerca al del azúcar, que es el máximo.
De hecho, el epidemiólogo y gran experto en la dieta mediterránea, Miguel Ángel Martínez-González escribió en su libro Salud a ciencia cierta : "La harina refinada es principalmente almidón —una importante materia prima para la industria alimentaria— y, en cuanto se mezcla con la saliva, se convierte en glucosa . Dicho con otras palabras: es como si comiéramos azúcar". Y esto, ¿cómo afecta a nuestro páncreas?
Un páncreas trabajador "Con cada bocado, el páncreas debe liberar jugos gástricos y hormonas para extraer los nutrientes de los alimentos que ingiere. Hacer que el páncreas se esfuerce demasiado —al comer, beber o fumar demasiado— puede provocar problemas de salud graves", explican los Institutos Nacionales de Salud de Estados Unidos (NIH, por sus siglas en inglés) . La hormona más conocida que produce el páncreas, en este sentido, es la insulina.
"La insulina controla cómo el azúcar, o glucosa, es absorbida por las células del cuerpo. Si las células productoras de insulina en el páncreas se dañan, podría desarrollar diabetes. La diabetes tipo 2 se desarrolla cuando el páncreas no puede producir suficiente insulina para manejar el azúcar en la sangre ", continúan los NIH. En este sentido, los alimentos con alto índice glucémico, como el pan, el arroz o la pasta blancos, dan trabajo a este órgano.
Éstos son los ocho alimentos que evitan que destroces tu páncreas: el órgano vital más olvidado Martínez-González también explica a este respecto que "este trabajo del páncreas resulta más difícil cuanta más grasa tiene una persona en su cuerpo y más sedentaria es , ya que el sobrepeso, la obesidad y el sedentarismo hacen que nuestras células se hagan resistentes a la acción de la insulina y, por tanto, se requiere el doble o el triple de insulina para conseguir lo mismo".
La Clínica Universidad de Navarra (CUN) también explica que los alimentos de alto índice glucémico se relacionan con la obesidad y las enfermedades cardiovasculares. "Pueden dificultar la pérdida de peso, ya que generan hambre y favorecen picos de insulina que contribuyen a la acumulación de grasa corporal. Reducirlos facilita el control del apetito", explica este centro médico.
Así se manifiesta el cáncer de páncreas en España: los primeros síntomas a los que debes prestar atención Y, ¿qué podemos hacer? El pan es un producto muy arraigado en la cultura de España y, por lo tanto, más que eliminarlo, la solución más interesante puede ser pasarnos al pan integral. Este pan está hecho a base de harinas de grano completo, que preservan el salvado. Gracias a esta capa, es un alimento con más fibra y, por lo tanto, con un índice glucémico menor.
NEWSLETTER - CIENCIA Salud, nutrición y avances científicos en tu correo todos los sábados Apuntarme De conformidad con el RGPD y la LOPDGDD, EL LEÓN DE EL ESPAÑOL PUBLICACIONES, S.A. tratará los datos facilitados con la finalidad de remitirle noticias de actualidad.
